findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Receiving Party to long-term liabilities and obligations, which can be difficult to manage and may lead to unintentional breaches over time.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information can lead to ambiguity and potential disputes over what is considered confidential, increasing the risk of inadvertent disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
